name: dmec2d
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wcel(c0, cdm(c1)), wcel(c2, cdm(c1))))
-| wi(w0, wceq(cdm(c1), cdm(c1)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(cec(c0, c1), cec(c2, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wcel(c0, cdm(c1)), wcel(c2, cdm(c1))))
-| wi(w0, wceq(cdm(c1), cdm(c1)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(cec(c0, c1), cec(c2, c1)))

|- wi(w0, wb(wcel(c0, cdm(c1)), wcel(c2, cdm(c1))))
-| wi(w0, wceq(cec(c0, c1), cec(c2, c1)))

comment: Equality of the coset of ` B ` and the coset of ` C ` implies equivalence of domain elementhood (equivalence is not necessary as opposed to ~ ereldm ). (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 12-Oct-2018.)
